mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les mimes, enseignemens et prouerbes de Ian Antoine de Baif
Continuation des mimes, enseignemens et prouerbes de I. Antoine de Baif
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Baïf, Jean-Antoine de, 1532-1589 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Divisional title at leaf *1: Continuation des mimes, enseignemens et prouerbes de I. Antoine de Baif. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Thouvenin. "Ex musæo Caroli Nodier" in gilt on both covers. Bookplates of A. De Claye and of Dr. Desnos. Unidentified armorial bookplate, red leather, shield with anchor and three stars. Unidentified monogram bookplate. Handwritten note, "Marcel Benard, vente 5/14/25, no. 53." Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 156. [original]
